H0.text: What is the most common surname in Korea. Lee

H1.text: What is the most common surname in Korea. Park

H2.text: What is the most common surname in Korea. Choi

H3.text: What is the most common surname in Korea. Kim

A4.text: The most common Korean surname (particularly in South Korea) is Kim (Korean: 김; Hanja: 金), followed by Lee (이; 李) and Park (박; 朴)

A5.text: These three surnames are held by around half of the ethnic Korean population.
